Translations.Text: Fanshi wo suo feichu de, huo shi ren wangji de qishi, wo bi yi geng hao de huo tongyang de qishi daiti ta. Nandao ni bu zhidao zhenzhu dui yu wanshi shi quanneng de ma?
Nandao ni bu zhidao zhenzhu you tiandi de guo quan ma? Chu zhenzhu zhi wai, nimen ji meiyou renhe baohu zhe, you meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Nimen xiang qingwen nimen de shizhe, xiang yiqian tamen qingwen mu sa yiyang ma? Yi zhengxin huanqu mi wu de ren, que yi mishi zhengdaole.

Xinfeng tian jing de ren dangzhong, you xuduo ren wei yuan shi nimen zai ji xindao zhihou bian cheng bu xindao zhe, zhe shi yinwei tamen zai zhenli ji ming zhihou ji shi nimen de yuangu. Dan nimen yingdang shu rao tamen, yuanliang tamen, zhidao zhenzhu fabu mingling. Zhenzhu dui yu wanshi que shi quanneng de.
Nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke. Fan nimen wei ziji er xing de shan, nimen jiang zai zhenzhu nali fa jian qi baochou. Zhenzhu que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de.
Tamen shuo: Chu youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu wai, bie de ren jue bude ru leyuan. Zhe shi tamen de wangxiang. Ni shuo: Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de, namo, nimen na chu zhengju lai ba!
Buran, fan quanti guishun zhenzhu, erqie xingshan zhe, jiang zai zhu nali xiangshou baochou, tamen jianglai meiyou kongju, ye meiyou youchou.
